name: Basket Ball 3D ShootOut
description:
Description

Basketball 3D Shootout game is the best hooping balls game.

Aim, focus, hoop and shot towards the nets for higher level points to win the medal trophy. Realistic 3D physics of ball hit, bounces, misses etc. Adrenaline game music with dynamic random camera angles. Need new color of the ball? You got it. Option to play in night mode or day mode as well as choice to turn off background music. Learn to be pro basketball pro by practicing more and unlocking the various levels of the game.

Ready! Set! Go.!!

Features:

* Touch, tap and flick the ball towards the nets
* Ball motion sensor tilt and acceleration of ball object gravity depends on various camera angles modes of play and force of flicking direction.
* Unlock more levels for higher medal trophy
* Day & Night mode
* Choice of ball color
* Brag your profile scores with others
* Optionally turn off game music audio on/off.
* Racing with the limited balls for more points at each level.
* Fun arcade game for all ages including kids

Best extreme street basket ball outdoor park game now available for new devices.
